extensionDescription.message: Clean, privacy-focused HTTP header modifier for developers and noobs. No ads, no tracking.

headersApplyAllRequests.message: Headers will apply to all requests

enterProfileName.description: Prompt text for entering a new profile name

enterNewName.description: Prompt text for renaming a profile

cannotDeleteLastProfile.description: Alert when user tries to delete the last profile

confirmImport.message: Import $1 profile(s)? This will replace existing profiles.

confirmClearAll.message: Clear all profiles and settings? This cannot be undone!
confirmClearAll.description: Confirmation shown when clearing all data

invalidProfileFormat.description: Error shown when imported file is not valid

welcomeFeatureSimpleDesc.message: Intuitive interface designed for developers and noobs alike. No clutter, just headers.

welcomeFeaturePrivacyDesc.message: No ads, no tracking, no analytics. Your data stays on your device.

welcomeFeatureProfilesDesc.message: Create multiple profiles for different scenarios. Switch instantly.

welcomeFeatureFiltersDesc.message: Apply headers to specific domains or URL patterns.

welcomeFeatureImportExportDesc.message: Share configurations with your team or backup your profiles.

welcomeFeatureOpenSourceDesc.message: Built in the open. Contribute on GitHub or audit the code.

welcomeReadyDesc.message: Click the extension icon in your toolbar to create your first profile!

welcomeTip1.message: Click the extension icon to open the popup

welcomeTip2.message: Create profiles for different development scenarios

welcomeTip3.message: Use filters to target specific URLs or domains

welcomeTip4.message: Export your profiles to share with teammates

welcomeTip5.message: Check the Debug section if something isn't working
